#summary How to run iTSfv from Source
#labels Phase-Support

= Requirements =

 * Visual Studio 2008 
 * Latest iTunes 
 * Portable Archive (requires JRE 1.4.1 or higher, no Explorer integration) from http://www.syntevo.com/smartsvn/download.html
 * Google Code Password from http://code.google.com/hosting/settings

= Setting up SmartSVN =

==What you want to do?==
[http://i38.tinypic.com/oi5cgk.png]

==Check out Project==
[http://i37.tinypic.com/v5agxh.png]

 # Click Manage
 # Click Add in Repository Files

===Add Repository File===
[http://i36.tinypic.com/1127fpy.png]

 * Enter SVN URL
{{{
https://itsfv.googlecode.com/svn
}}}

[http://i35.tinypic.com/16bn69d.png]

 * Press OK
 * Now Add Repository file will look like: 
[http://i36.tinypic.com/eld89u.png]
 * Press Next 
 * Enter Google UserName and Google Code Password
[http://i36.tinypic.com/24159o1.png]
 * Accept Server Finger Print
[http://i37.tinypic.com/2mmwr9f.png]
 * Click Finish


Now we are back to Check out Project
[http://i33.tinypic.com/t7yb7d.png]

 * Press Next
 * Select *trunk* folder
[http://i34.tinypic.com/10nf6t3.png]
 * Press Next
 * Create folder path Visual Studio 2008\Projects\iTSfv\trunk 
[http://i37.tinypic.com/2hmhjc9.png]
 * Select the folder trunk
[http://i34.tinypic.com/2n1rlm8.png]
 * Press Next
 * Rename 'trunk' to iTSfv
[http://i33.tinypic.com/fxzcxd.png]
 * Press Finish
[http://i35.tinypic.com/2e2noud.png]

SmartSVN will be now checking out source
[http://i37.tinypic.com/xf6ik0.png]
